Spring 2017 Launch Report

This report contains the details of the Spring 2017 Launch of the Lightning from the Edge of Space VIP team at Georgia Tech.

Find Out More

Mission Objectives

Flight Computer

Testing the new, lighter flight computer and the accompanying APRS transmitter.

Platform

Testing the new platform design based only on a single Raspberry Pi and Python code.

Geiger Counter

Testing the new Geiger Counter sensor, its accuracy and its communications.

Inertial Measurements

Testing the new compass/gyro/accelerometer inertial measurement unit.

Contact Us

The planning, design and launch were carried out by a team of undergraduates at the Georgia Institute of Technology under the supervision of Prof. Morris Cohen. Feel free to contact us for questions.
